original_text: And all the people went up after him, playing on pipes, and rejoicing with great joy, so that the earth was split by their noise.
korean_text: 모든 백성이 그를 따라 올라와서 피리를 불며 크게 즐거워하므로 땅이 그들의 소리로 말미암아 갈라질 듯하니

sentences.original_text: And all the people went up after him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 백성이 그를 따라 올라가고,

sentences.original_text: so that the earth was split by their noise.
